title: Graph-Theoretic Insights into Bayesian Personalized Ranking for Recommendation
authors: Zheng K, Wang J X, Xu J H
summary_cn: 本工作从图论视角分析 Bayesian Personalized Ranking，为推荐排序模型提供理论解释与改进方向。

title: LRTM: Left-Right Transition Matrices for Molecular Association Prediction
venue: IEEE/ACM Transactions on Computational Biology and Bioinformatics
authors: Zheng K, Duan G H, Yang M Y, et al.
summary_cn: 提出左右转移矩阵框架用于分子关联预测，兼顾性能与模型稳定性。

title: SPRDA: A Link Prediction Approach Based on Structural Perturbation
authors: Zheng K, Zhang X L, Wang L, et al.
summary_cn: 基于结构扰动思想进行疾病相关 piRNA 关联推断，提升关联预测可靠性。
